Name: hemophagocytic lymphohistiocytosis
Definition: A lymphatic system disease that is characterized by an expansion of the monocyte-macrophage population and intense hemophagocytosis. It can occur de novo

Name: obsolete tuberculous encephalitis
Definition: A lymphatic system disease that is characterized by an expansion of the monocyte-macrophage population and intense hemophagocytosis. It can occur de novo

Name: lymphatic system cancer
Definition: An immune system cancer that is located_in the lymphatic system and is characterized by uncontrolled cellular proliferation of lymphoid tissue.

Name: Hennekam syndrome
Definition: A lymphatic system disease characterized by he presence of intestinal lymphangiectasia

Name: splenic disease
Definition: A myeloma and spenic disease that is located_in the bone marrow that results_in the marrow being replaced by fibrous (scar) tissue and has_symptom abdominal fullness related to an enlarged spleen

Name: histiocytosis
Definition: A lymphatic system disease that is characterized by an excessive number of histiocytes.

Name: lymphocele
Definition: A dermatophytosis that results_in contagious fungal infection located_in scalp

Name: obsolete complications occurring mainly in the course of labor and delivery
Definition: A dermatophytosis that results_in contagious fungal infection located_in scalp
Synonym: Rupture of uterus before onset of labor

Name: obsolete malignant neoplasm of thymus
Definition: A dermatophytosis that results_in contagious fungal infection located_in scalp
Synonym: Rupture of uterus before onset of labor

Name: obsolete bovine anaplasmosis
Definition: A dermatophytosis that results_in contagious fungal infection located_in scalp

Name: obsolete primary Anaplasmataceae infectious disease
Definition: A dermatophytosis that results_in contagious fungal infection located_in scalp

Name: lymphedema
Definition: A commensal bacterial infectious disease that results_in infection

Name: obsolete Ewing's family recurrent tumor

Synonym: recurrent Ewing's sarcoma/peripheral primitive neuroectodermal tumor

Definition: A commensal bacterial infectious disease that results_in infection

Name: thymus gland disease
Definition: A fallopian tube cancer that derives_from germ cells.

Name: lymphangitis
Definition: A lymphatic system disease that is characterized by inflammation of the lymphatic channels which occurs as a result of infection at a site distal to the channel. It is caused by Streptococcus pyogenes (Group A strep) or Staphylococcus aureus. Lymphangitis is also sometimes called blood poisoning.
Synonym: Glaucoma associated with anomalies of iris (disorder)

Name: obsolete intervertebral disc disorder
Definition: A lymphatic system disease that is characterized by inflammation of the lymphatic channels which occurs as a result of infection at a site distal to the channel. It is caused by Streptococcus pyogenes (Group A strep) or Staphylococcus aureus. Lymphangitis is also sometimes called blood poisoning.
Synonym: displacement of thoracic or lumbar intervertebral disc without myelopathy

Name: obsolete Cestoda infectious disease
Definition: A parasitic helminthiasis infectious disease that involves infection by parasitic flatworms known as tapeworms living in the vertebrate digestive tract.

Name: lymph node disease
Definition: An acute inflammation of lacrimal passage that is characterized by inflammation of the lacrimal sac

Name: obsolete syphilitic episcleritis
Definition: An acute inflammation of lacrimal passage that is characterized by inflammation of the lacrimal sac
